4.3. umbra.components.addons.projectsExplorer.views¶

views.py

Platform:
Windows, Linux, Mac Os X.
Description:
This module defines the umbra.components.factory.projectsExplorer.projectsExplorer.ProjectsExplorer Component Interface class View.

Others:
